org.corfudb.infrastructure

Class ManagementServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.infrastructure.AbstractServer
      • org.corfudb.infrastructure.ManagementServer

  • public class ManagementServer
extends AbstractServer
    Handles reconfiguration and workflow requests to the Management Server. Spawns the following services: - Management Agent. - Orchestrator.

    Created by zlokhandwala on 9/28/16.

      • handleHeartbeatRequest

        public void handleHeartbeatRequest(CorfuMsg msg,
                                   io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                   IServerRouter r)
        Handles the heartbeat request. It accumulates the metrics required to build and send the response. The response comprises of the local nodeMetrics and this node's view of the cluster (ClusterView).
        Parameters:
        msg - corfu message containing HEARTBEAT_REQUEST
        ctx - netty ChannelHandlerContext
        r - server router

      • handleNodeStateRequest

        public void handleNodeStateRequest(CorfuMsg msg,
                                   io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                   IServerRouter r)
        Returns current NodeState provided by failure detector. The detector periodically collects current cluster state and saves it in ClusterStateContext. Servers periodically inspect cluster and ask each other of the connectivity/node state (connection status between current node and all the others). The node provides its current node state. Default NodeState has been providing unless the node is not bootstrapped. Failure detector updates ClusterNodeState by current state then current NodeState can be provided to other nodes.
        Parameters:
        msg - corfu message containing NODE_STATE_REQUEST
        ctx - netty ChannelHandlerContext
        r - server router

      • handleFailureDetectorMetricsRequest

        public void handleFailureDetectorMetricsRequest(CorfuMsg msg,
                                                io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
